actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
short_title: Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area Act

summary.text: Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area in Colorado. Designates the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area Board of Directors as the management entity for the Heritage Area. Requires the Board to prepare and submit a management plan for the Heritage Area.

titles.title: Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area Act
To establish the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
